titleStmt.title: Description of Columbia University. MS Or 369: al-ʻĀqibah fī dhikr al-mawt.

availability.licence: These images and the content of Rare Book and Manuscript Library MS Or 369: al-ʻĀqibah fī dhikr al-mawt. are free of known copyright restrictions and in the public domain. notesStmt.note: Catalog entry from German sale catalog, lot 372, pasted onto inside back cover.

msContents.summary: Lacunose copy of a work on Islamic eschatology; missing large portions of the text from the middle and from the end.

author.persName: Ibn al-Kharrāṭ, ʻAbd al-Ḥaqq ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān, 1116 or 1117-1185
ابن الخراط، عبد الحق بن عبد الرحمن،

supportDesc.extent: 194 bi-paginated leaves : 230 x 165 (190 x 125) mm, bound to 235 x 170 mm

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in neat naskh in brown ink.

decoDesc.decoNote: Chapter headings in larger script; space has been left for rubrications that were not added.

binding.p: Bound in modern brown and black speckled cardboard with brown textile spine.

history.provenance: Gift of Richard J. H. Gottheil (bookplate inside front cover).
Formerly owned by Louis H. Gray, 29 July 1907 (signature and date, first flyleaf recto at front of book).
